snippet.title: Breeze in the Clouds - Humble Games Showcase 2025 Trailer
snippet.description: Get a fresh look at gameplay as a good boy takes on enemies in this latest Breeze in the Clouds trailer for the upcoming 2D action-adventure game. Breeze in the Clouds will be available on PC in 2025. Jump, brawl, and command the powers of weather as Breeze, a scrappy corgi swept into a world in the clouds where animal forces control the weather. Battle the elements with combo-fueled 2D brawling action as you accumulate the ultimate puppy power!
